    Processing global data in R An Example ELSA Workflow

    Function reference

    Prepare Planning Region

    Functions to prepare the planning region for the ELSA workflow

    make_boundary()
    Create a boundary of the planning region
    make_planning_units()
    Function to create planning units and custom projection

    Prepare Feature Data

    Functions to prepare the global datasets for the ELSA workflow

    get_all_features()
    Wrapper function to get a raster file with all wanted features
    make_forest_integrity()
    Create the forest integrity index using flii and fsii data
    make_managed_forests()
    Create managed forests data layer
    make_mangroves()
    Function to extract general vector data
    make_normalised_raster()
    Create a Normalized Raster Aligned with and masked by Planning Units
    make_protected_areas()
    Function to create existing protected area raster file.

    Set up ELSA analysis

    Functions to help formulate a conservation problem for an ELSA analysis

    make_protection_zone()
    Function to create protection zone for ELSA analysis

    Post-hoc analysis for ELSA framework

    Functions to help formulate a conservation problem for an ELSA analysis

    calc_feat_rep()
    Calculate feature representation

    ELSA-specific plotting functions

    Functions to help visualise ELSA output

    elsa_plot_output_map()
    Create a Map of the ELSA output to download with GIS layers
    elsa_plot_representation()
    Create a Bar Plot of Feature Representation

    ELSA-specific utilities functions

    Functions to help ELSA analysis

    get_elsa_coverage()
    Calculate the Percentage Area Coverage for a Given Zone
    get_elsa_min_lockin_target()
    Get Minimum Lock-in Targets for Zones
    get_elsa_target()
    Get country-specific target value based on the total area of planning units (PU)

    Helper Functions

    elsar_load_data()
    Load different types of data
    make_custom_projection()
    Create a custom projection based on the planning region
    make_postgres_connection()
    Create a PostgreSQL Connection Configuration as a Dictionary

    Utilities

    convert_points_polygon()
    Create Buffered Polygons from Point Geometries
    extract_filename_filetype()
    Extract the file name and file type of data in the local path
    rescale_raster()
    Rescale rasters to between 0 and 1
    exact_rasterise()
    Efficient Rasterization of polygon features with Coverage Fraction, based on some attribute
    get_coverage()
    Calculate country areal coverage (as a percentage) of an input binary layer, likely representing a zone.

    Plotting function

    Functions to plot input and output data of an ELSA workflow

    elsar_plot_distribution()
    Function to create basic histogram with categorical data
    elsar_plot_static_raster_c()
    Function to create a static plot from raster data with continuous data
    elsar_plot_static_raster_d()
    Function to create a static plot from raster data with discrete data

    Utilities plotting

    elsar_continuous_to_categorical()
    Function to create categories for plotting out of continuous data
    elsar_extend()
    Function to extend the spatial extend around a raster file for plotting
    elsar_plot_background_c()
    Function to create a plot with continuous background data for another plot
    elsar_plot_background_d()
    Function to create a plot with discrete background data for another plot
    elsar_plot_extra_data()
    Function to add additional data to an existing plot
    elsar_plot_optics()
    Function to easily adapt the visual appearance of a plot

    Datasets

    boundary_dat
    Data used to extract the Nepal boundary
    current_pas_sf
    Data used for current protected areas
    get_wad_data()
    Get wad data saved as tif
